description:
Until now, there has not been a standard for showing a video/movie on a web page.

Today, most videos are shown through a plug-in (like flash). However, different browsers may have different plug-ins.

HTML5 defines a new element which specifies a standard way to embed a video/movie on a web page.

With "Building a HTML5 Video Player From Scratch", you will learn everything about HTML5 Video, even if you've never build one before!

The full course has several video lectures, divided into several chapters. Each chapter will give you a new level of knowledge in HTML5 Video. We'll start from the basics of HTML5 Video Player to more advanced and the most popular APIs used now a days.

NOTE: In order to keep you up to date in the world of HTML5 Video all the chapters will be updated regularly with new lectures, projects, quizzes and any changes in future versions of all the programming languages covered on the course.
title: Building a HTML5 Video Player From Scratch
